sql_query.sql: UPDATE "partner_stockrecord" SET "product_id" = 336, "partner_id" = 276, "partner_sku" = 'sku_336_1175', "price_currency" = 'GBP', "price" = 9.99, "num_in_stock" = 10, "num_allocated" = NULL, "low_stock_threshold" = NULL, "date_created" = '2024-07-22T17:26:56.332345+00:00'::timestamptz, "date_updated" = '2024-07-22T17:26:56.399242+00:00'::timestamptz, "offer_name" = NULL WHERE "partner_stockrecord"."id" = 315
SELECT COUNT(*) AS "__count" FROM "customer_productalert" WHERE ("customer_productalert"."product_id" IN (336) AND "customer_productalert"."status" = 'Active')

SELECT "customer_productalert"."id", "customer_productalert"."product_id", "customer_productalert"."user_id", "customer_productalert"."email", "customer_productalert"."key", "customer_productalert"."status", "customer_productalert"."date_created", "customer_productalert"."date_confirmed", "customer_productalert"."date_cancelled", "customer_productalert"."date_closed" FROM "customer_productalert" WHERE ("customer_productalert"."product_id" IN (336) AND "customer_productalert"."status" = 'Active') ORDER BY "customer_productalert"."date_created" DESC

return_value.value: PurchaseInfo(price=FixedPrice({'currency': 'GBP', 'excl_tax': Decimal('9.99'), 'tax': Decimal('0.00'), 'tax_code': None}), availability=<oscar.apps.partner.availability.StockRequired object at 0x315bec820>, stockrecord=<StockRecord: Partner: -2, product: Dùｍϻϒ title (sku_336_1175)>)
